title: Man accidentally shoots himself at Izziban Sushi in Indian River County
content:
INDIAN RIVER COUNTY — An accidental shooting wounded a customer at a sushi bar Sunday, the Indian River County Sheriff's Office said.
David Solomon Slay, 33, was dining with his girlfriend at Izziban Sushi in the 900 block of 14th Lane, Vero Beach, when his handgun, tucked into his waistband, fired as he stood up at his table, deputies said. The bullet went through Slay's leg, according to a report.
The injury was not expected to be life-threatening, officials said. Indian River County Fire Rescue took the man to Lawnwood Regional Medical Center & Heart Institute in Fort Pierce. There was no information available about whether Slay was still being treated Tuesday.
Slay is a concealed weapons permit holder, the Sheriff's Office said.
